sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { ShieldCheckIcon, ExclamationTriangleIcon, BugAntIcon, PlayIcon, ClockIcon, CheckCircleIcon, XCircleIcon, InformationCircleIcon, ChartBarIcon, GlobeAltIcon, ArrowPathIcon, ServerIcon, CpuChipIcon, EyeIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const RASTDashboard: React.FC = () => { // Mock data for the dashboard const overviewData = { totalProjects: 12, activeScans: 3, totalScans: 47, securityScore: 82.5, totalVulnerabilities: 156, criticalVulnerabilities: 8, highVulnerabilities: 23, mediumVulnerabilities: 67, lowVulnerabilities: 58 }; const recentActivity = [ { id: 1, type: 'scan_completed', project: 'E-commerce Web App', description: 'Full security scan completed', timestamp: '2 hours ago', status: 'success' }, { id: 2, type: 'vulnerability_detected', project: 'Admin Portal', description: 'SQL injection vulnerability detected', timestamp: '4 hours ago', status: 'warning' }, { id: 3, type: 'scan_started', project: 'API Gateway', description: 'Runtime security scan initiated', timestamp: '6 hours ago', status: 'info' }, { id: 4, type: 'threat_blocked', project: 'User Dashboard', description: 'Suspicious activity blocked', timestamp: '8 hours ago', status: 'success' } ]; const securityMetrics = [ { name: 'Runtime Protection', value: '98.2%', change: '+2.1%', changeType: 'positive', icon: ShieldCheckIcon }, { name: 'Threat Detection', value: '94.7%', change: '+1.8%', changeType: 'positive', icon: EyeIcon }, { name: 'Response Time', value: '45ms', change: '-12ms', changeType: 'positive', icon: ClockIcon }, { name: 'False Positives', value: '2.3%', change: '-0.5%', changeType: 'positive', icon: CheckCircleIcon } ]; const vulnerabilityTrends = [ { month: 'Jan', critical: 12, high: 28, medium: 45, low: 67 }, { month: 'Feb', critical: 10, high: 25, medium: 42, low: 65 }, { month: 'Mar', critical: 8, high: 23, medium: 40, low: 62 }, { month: 'Apr', critical: 9, high: 26, medium: 43, low: 64 }, { month: 'May', critical: 7, high: 22, medium: 38, low: 60 }, { month: 'Jun', critical: 6, high: 20, medium: 35, low: 58 } ]; return (
{/* Overview Cards */}

Total Projects

{overviewData.totalProjects}

Active Scans

{overviewData.activeScans}

Total Vulnerabilities

{overviewData.totalVulnerabilities}

Security Score

{overviewData.securityScore}%
{/* Security Metrics */}

Security Performance Metrics

{securityMetrics.map((metric, index) => (

{metric.name}

{metric.value}

{metric.change}
))}
{/* Vulnerability Distribution and Recent Activity */}
{/* Vulnerability Distribution */}

Vulnerability Distribution

Critical
{overviewData.criticalVulnerabilities} ({((overviewData.criticalVulnerabilities / overviewData.totalVulnerabilities) * 100).toFixed(1)}%)
High
{overviewData.highVulnerabilities} ({((overviewData.highVulnerabilities / overviewData.totalVulnerabilities) * 100).toFixed(1)}%)
Medium
{overviewData.mediumVulnerabilities} ({((overviewData.mediumVulnerabilities / overviewData.totalVulnerabilities) * 100).toFixed(1)}%)
Low
{overviewData.lowVulnerabilities} ({((overviewData.lowVulnerabilities / overviewData.totalVulnerabilities) * 100).toFixed(1)}%)
{/* Progress Bar */}
{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

{recentActivity.map((activity) => (

{activity.project}

{activity.description}

{activity.timestamp}

))}
{/* Runtime Protection Status */}

Runtime Protection Status

Protected

8 applications actively protected

Monitoring

3 applications under observation

At Risk

1 application needs attention

 {/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions
); }; export default RASTDashboard;
